00011 bool read_grid(const char* name, grid_type* data)
00012 {
00013   char ch[4];
00014   std::ifstream in(name, std::ios::binary);
00015   if (!in.read(ch, sizeof(ch)))
00016     return false;
00017 
00018   if (strncmp(ch, "DSBB", 4) == 0)
00019   {
00020     if (!in.read((char*) &data->cx, sizeof(data->cx)))
00021       return false;
00022     if (!in.read((char*) &data->cy, sizeof(data->cy)))
00023       return false;
00024     if (!in.read((char*) &data->x1, sizeof(data->x1)))
00025       return false;
00026     if (!in.read((char*) &data->x2, sizeof(data->x2)))
00027       return false;
00028     if (!in.read((char*) &data->y1, sizeof(data->y1)))
00029       return false;
00030     if (!in.read((char*) &data->y2, sizeof(data->y2)))
00031       return false;
00032     if (!in.read((char*) &data->z1, sizeof(data->z1)))
00033       return false;
00034     if (!in.read((char*) &data->z2, sizeof(data->z2)))
00035       return false;
00036 
00037     int nn = data->cx * data->cy;
00038     data->zz = new float[nn];
00039     in.read((char*) data->zz, nn * sizeof(float));
00040   }
00041   else if (strncmp(ch, "DSAA", 4) == 0)
00042   {
00043     std::ifstream in(name);
00044     std::string ch;
00045     if (in >> ch >> data->cx >> data->cy >> data->x1 >> data->x2 >> \
00046       data->y1 >> data->y2 >> data->z1 >> data->z2)
00047     {
00048       int nn = data->cx * data->cy;
00049       data->zz = new float[nn];
00050       int n = std::copy(std::istream_iterator<float>(in), \
00051           std::istream_iterator<float>(), data->zz) - data->zz;
00052       return (n == nn);
00053     }
00054     return false;
00055   }
00056   else if (strncmp(ch, "DSRB", 4) == 0)
00057   {
00058     long nn;
00059     if (!in.read((char*) &nn, sizeof(nn)) || nn != 4)
00060       return false;
00061 
00062     long ver;
00063     if (!in.read((char*) &ver, sizeof(ver)) || ver != 1)
00064       return false;
00065 
00066     if (!in.read((char*) ch, sizeof(ch)) || strncmp(ch, "GRID", 4) != 0)
00067       return false;
00068 
00069     if (!in.read((char*) &nn, sizeof(nn)) || nn != 9*8)
00070       return false;
00071 
00072     long cy;
00073     if (!in.read((char*) &cy, sizeof(cy)))
00074       return false;
00075     data->cy = (short) cy;
00076 
00077     long cx;
00078     if (!in.read((char*) &cx, sizeof(cx)))
00079       return false;
00080     data->cx = (short) cx;
00081 
00082     if (!in.read((char*) &data->x1, sizeof(data->x1)))
00083       return false;
00084 
00085     if (!in.read((char*) &data->y1, sizeof(data->y1)))
00086       return false;
00087 
00088     double dx;
00089     if (!in.read((char*) &dx, sizeof(dx)))
00090       return false;
00091     data->x2 = data->x1 + dx * (data->cx-1);
00092 
00093     double dy;
00094     if (!in.read((char*) &dy, sizeof(dy)))
00095       return false;
00096     data->y2 = data->y1 + dy * (data->cy-1);
00097 
00098     if (!in.read((char*) &data->z1, sizeof(data->z1)))
00099       return false;
00100 
00101     if (!in.read((char*) &data->z2, sizeof(data->z2)))
00102       return false;
00103 
00104     double rot;
00105     if (!in.read((char*) &rot, sizeof(rot)))
00106       return false;
00107 
00108     double bln;
00109     if (!in.read((char*) &bln, sizeof(bln)))
00110       return false;
00111 
00112     if (!in.read(ch, sizeof(ch)) || strncmp(ch, "DATA", 4) != 0)
00113       return false;
00114 
00115     if (!in.read((char*) &nn, sizeof(nn)) || nn != (long) (cx * cy * sizeof(double)))
00116       return false;
00117 
00118     nn = cx * cy;
00119     data->zz = new float[nn];
00120     for (int i = 0; i < nn; ++i)
00121     {
00122       double z;
00123       if (!in.read((char*) &z, sizeof(z)))
00124         return false;
00125       data->zz[i] = (float) z;
00126     }
00127   }
00128   else
00129   {
00130     return false;
00131   }
00132   return true;
00133 }
00134 
00135 void histeq(int n_data, const float* data, int n_level, float* level)
00136 {
00137   int i, *pp = new int[n_data];
00138   float* zz = new float[n_data];
00139   float *z = zz;
00140   for (i = 0; i < n_data; ++i)
00141   {
00142     float d = data[i];
00143     if (!_isnan(d))
00144       *z++ = d;
00145   }
00146   n_data = (z - zz);
00147   // std::copy(data, data+n_data, zz);
00148   std::sort(zz, zz+n_data);
00149   int np = 0;
00150   pp[np] = 1;
00151   for (i = 1; i < n_data; ++i)
00152   {
00153     if (zz[i] != zz[np])
00154     {
00155       ++np;
00156       zz[np] = zz[i];
00157       pp[np] = 1;
00158     }
00159     else
00160     {
00161       ++pp[np];
00162     }
00163   }
00164   ++np;
00165   std::partial_sum(pp, pp+np, pp);
00166   float *ff = new float[np-1];
00167   for (i = 0; i < np-1; ++i)
00168   {
00169     // ff[i] = (float) pp[i] / n_data;
00170     ff[i] = (float) pp[i] / n_data;
00171   }
00172   level[0] = zz[0];
00173   for (i = 1; i < n_level-1; ++i)
00174   {
00175     float p = (float) i / n_level;
00176     assert(ff[0] <= p && p <= ff[np-2]);
00177     int n = std::lower_bound(ff, ff+np-1, p) - ff;
00178     if (p < ff[n])
00179     {
00180       float f0 = (n > 0? ff[n-1]: 0.0f);
00181       level[i] = zz[n] + (zz[n+1] - zz[n]) * (p - f0) / (ff[n] - f0);
00182     }
00183     else
00184     {
00185       level[i] = zz[n];
00186     }
00187   }
00188   level[i] = zz[np-1];
00189   delete[] ff;
00190   delete[] zz;
00191   delete[] pp;
00192 }
00193 
00194 bool sub(grid_type* g1, grid_type* g2, grid_type* g3)
00195 {
00196   if (g1->cx != g2->cx || g1->cy != g2->cy || g1->x1 != g2->x1 || g1->y1 != g2->y1
00197     || g1->x2 != g2->x2 || g1->y2 != g2->y2)
00198     return false;
00199 
00200   g3->cx = g1->cx;
00201   g3->cy = g1->cy;
00202   g3->x1 = g1->x1;
00203   g3->y1 = g1->y1;
00204   g3->x2 = g1->x2;
00205   g3->y2 = g1->y2;
00206   
00207   int nn = g1->cx * g1->cy;
00208   g3->zz = new float[nn];
00209   std::transform(g2->zz, g2->zz+nn, g1->zz, g3->zz, std::minus<float>());
00210   g3->z1 = *std::min_element(g3->zz, g3->zz+nn);
00211   g3->z2 = *std::max_element(g3->zz, g3->zz+nn);
00212   return true;
00213 }

00217 void main()
00218 {
00219   grid_type g;
00220   g.zz = 0;
00221   if (!read_grid("d:\\dat\\depth-to-top.grd", &g))
00222   {
00223     std::cerr << "failed to load data\n";
00224     delete[] g.zz;
00225     return;
00226   }
00227 
00228   psstream out("zz.ps");
00229   out.selectmedia(psstream::FORMAT_A4, psstream::PORTRAIT);
00230   double pg_width = out.pagewidth();
00231   double pg_height = out.pageheight();
00232   double pg_margin = 40.0;
00233   double px = pg_width - 2.0 * pg_margin;
00234   double py = pg_height - 2.0 * pg_margin;
00235   double dx = g.x2 - g.x1;
00236   double dy = g.y2 - g.y1;
00237   double x0, y0, sx, sy;
00238   if (px * dy < py * dx)
00239   {
00240     x0 = pg_margin;
00241     sx = px;
00242     sy = px * dy / dx;
00243     y0 = 0.5 * (pg_height - sy);
00244   }
00245   else
00246   {
00247     y0 = pg_margin;
00248     sy = py;
00249     sx = py * dx / dy;
00250     x0 = 0.5 * (pg_width - sx);
00251   }
00252 
00253   const int n = 5;
00254   float level[n];
00255   color_type color[n] =
00256   {
00257     { 1.0, 0.5, 0.5 },
00258     { 1.0, 1.0, 0.5 },
00259     { 0.5, 1.0, 0.5 },
00260     { 0.5, 1.0, 1.0 },
00261     { 0.5, 0.5, 1.0 }
00262   };
00263 
00264 #if 0
00265   histeq(g.cx*g.cy, g.zz, n, level);
00266 #else
00267   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00268   {
00269     level[i] = g.z1 + (g.z2 - g.z1) * (i+1) / (n+1);
00270     // level[i] = g.z1 + (g.z2 - g.z1) * i / (n-1);
00271   }
00272 #endif
00273 
00274   out.newpage();
00275   out.colorimage(x0, y0, sx, sy, n, level, color, g.cx, g.cy, g.zz);
00276   delete[] g.zz;
00277 }
